trans-unit.source: Represents the maximum number of connections to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Representerer maksimalt antall tilkoblinger til en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement"></xref> class with the specified address and connection limit information.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement"> </xref> klassen med den angitte adressen og tilkoblingsinformasjonen grensen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.Address%2A> property to `address` and the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.MaxConnection%2A> property to `maxConnection`.
A string that identifies the address of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: En streng som identifiserer adressen til en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: An integer that identifies the maximum number of connections allowed to `address` from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir maksimalt antall tilkoblinger til `address` fra den lokale datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the address for remote computers.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir adressen for eksterne datamaskiner.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property using an asterisk (*) to set the default number of connections for unspecified computers.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne egenskapen med en stjerne (*) til å angi standardantall tilkoblinger for uspesifisert datamaskiner.

trans-unit.source: This property identifies one or more remote computers and the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.MaxConnection%2A> property specifies how many simultaneous connections are allowed between the local computer and the remote computers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen identifiserer én eller flere eksterne datamaskiner og <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.MaxConnection%2A>egenskapen angir hvor mange samtidige tilkoblinger som tillates mellom den lokale datamaskinen og eksterne datamaskiner.</xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.MaxConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a regular expression describing an IP address or DNS name.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder et vanlig uttrykk som beskriver en IP-adresse eller DNS-navn.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections that can be made to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall tilkoblinger som kan gjøres til en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies how many simultaneous connections are allowed between the local computer and the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hvor mange samtidige tilkoblinger som tillates mellom den lokale datamaskinen og den eksterne datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: The remote computer is specified using the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.Address%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den eksterne datamaskinen er angitt med den <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.Address%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementElement.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an application is not changing <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> from the default, then the MaxConnection property applies to the entire application domain.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program ikke endres <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>enn standardinnstillingen deretter MaxConnection egenskapen gjelder for hele programdomenet.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If only a single application domain is running in your application, then the MaxConnection property setting is application-wide.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bare en enkelt programdomenet kjøres i programmet, er egenskapsinnstillingen MaxConnection generelle.

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the maximum number of connections.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir maksimalt antall tilkoblinger.
